hasteinmetz.github.io

Silly quiz game in order to learn JavaScript.

Country information (countries.txt) taken from Ian Coleman’s CIA World Factbook API.

Language JSON obtained by scraping Wikipedia’s entry on languages. The creation of this JSON file is licensed under Wikipedia’s Copyrights.

The scraper is written in Python. Please feel free to use the code… but it could probably be a bit more optimized…
